name: Maventeq Systems
tag_list: technology, software, web, web-design, consulting, erp, autocad, autodesk, fasttrack, business-process
overview:
Maventeq Systems is an innovative company that has identified the need for increased quality, reduced service times and overall improvement in operational efficiency which has become imperative for businesses and governments and we are strategically poised to fill that gap.

We recognize the need for uniqueness in every business as such, through our team of professionals we provide strategy, design, and solutions through convenient technology for each client hence bringing innovation and efficiency that would positively impact their bottom line. We are driven by the desire to help you maximize your resources in order to attain your corporate objectives

Maventeq Systems is the parent company of Employment Nigeria (www.employmentng.com), Nigeria’s number one career development and employment platform.
